item.title: 美联储鲍曼预计今年将再降息两次
item.description: 美联储理事米歇尔-鲍曼（Michelle Bowman）周二表示，她仍然预计美国央行将在 2025 年的最后两次政策会议上降息。【原文：Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman on Tuesday said she continues to anticipate that the U.S. central bank will deliver interest rate cuts at its final two policy meetings of 2025.】

item.title: 沃尔玛与 OpenAI 合作推出 ChatGPT 购物功能
item.description: 沃尔玛周二表示，它将与 OpenAI 合作，使顾客和山姆会员店会员能够使用人工智能聊天机器人的即时结账功能，直接在 ChatGPT 上购物。【原文：Walmart said on Tuesday it was partnering with OpenAI to enable customers and Sam's Club members to shop directly within ChatGPT, using the AI chatbot's Instant Checkout feature.】

item.title: 贝莱德撇开 First Brands 和 Tricolor 破产后更广泛的信贷传染担忧
item.description: 资产管理公司贝莱德（BlackRock）周二淡化了汽车零部件供应商First Brands和贷款公司Tricolor Holdings破产后信贷市场压力扩大的担忧，称借款人的整体信贷质量 "普遍强劲"。【原文：Asset manager BlackRock on Tuesday played down concerns of broader credit market stress after the bankruptcies of auto parts supplier First Brands and lender Tricolor Holdings, saying the overall credit quality of borrowers was "generally strong."】

item.title: 英国监管机构为 BlueCrest 基金投资者争取到 1.01 亿美元赔偿金
item.description: 英国金融行为监管局（Financial Conduct Authority）周二为 BlueCrest Capital Management 子管理的一家基金的投资者争取到了 1.01 亿美元的赔偿，并对该投资公司进行了公开谴责。【原文：Britain's Financial Conduct Authority on Tuesday secured a $101 million redress for investors in a fund sub-managed by BlueCrest Capital Management, and imposed a public censure on the investment firm.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织警告全球市场 "无序 "调整的几率上升
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，全球市场对贸易战、地缘政治紧张局势和巨额政府赤字等风险过于放松，再加上资产价格已经过高，增加了市场 "无序 "调整的可能性。【原文：Global markets are getting too comfortable with risks like trade wars, geopolitical tensions and yawning government deficits, which, combined with already overpriced assets, increase the chance of a "disorderly" market correction, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西巴西航空工业公司将向 TrueNoord 出售 20 架商用喷气机
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周二表示，已完成向租赁和管理公司 TrueNoord 出售 20 架 E195-E2 商用飞机的交易，交易价值 18 亿美元。【原文：Brazilian planemaker Embraer closed a deal to sell 20 of its E195-E2 commercial unit to leasing and management firm TrueNoord, in a deal valued at $1.8 billion, the companies said Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西 BTG Pactual 提议与 Pan 银行合并
item.description: 巴西投资银行 BTG Pactual 周一晚些时候宣布了一项具有约束力的建议，即收购 Pan 银行的股份，为小股东提供大幅溢价，使 Pan 银行成为其间接全资子公司。【原文：Brazilian investment bank BTG Pactual announced late on Monday a binding proposal to incorporate shares of Banco Pan , offering a significant premium to minority shareholders in a move that would make Pan its indirect wholly-owned subsidiary.】

item.title: 印度阿达尼公司看中陷入困境的房地产商撒哈拉公司的数十项资产，以建立土地储备
item.description: 印度亿万富翁高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）的房地产部门正在寻求法院批准，从一家陷入困境的房地产集团手中收购包括酒店和购物中心在内的 87 处房产，此举可能会促进该企业集团规模相对较小的业务发展。【原文：Indian billionaire Gautam Adani's property arm is seeking court approval to acquire 87 properties including hotels and malls from a distressed real estate group, a move that could bolster the conglomerate's relatively small business.】

item.title: 独家报道日本半导体公司瑞萨探索以 20 亿美元出售计时部门
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，瑞萨电子公司（Renesas Electronics Corp. ）正在探讨出售其定时部门，交易价值可能接近 20 亿美元。【原文：Renesas Electronics Corp. is exploring a sale of its timing division in a deal that could value the business at close to $2 billion, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国最高法院驳回对联邦保护科技平台的质疑
item.description: 美国最高法院拒绝重新评估科技公司对其平台上托管的内容所拥有的广泛法律豁免权，周二驳回了一名男性原告对 Grindr 提起的诉讼的上诉，这名原告在 15 岁时曾被通过同性恋约会应用程序匹配到的成年男子强奸。【原文：The U.S. Supreme Court declined a chance to reassess the broad legal immunity tech companies have over content hosted on their platforms, turning away on Tuesday an appeal in a lawsuit against Grindr by a male plaintiff who was raped at age 15 by adult men matched to him via the gay dating app.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）首席经济学家：人工智能投资热潮可能导致萧条，但不可能引发系统性危机
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）首席经济学家皮埃尔-奥利维耶-古林查斯（Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas）周二表示，美国人工智能投资热潮之后可能会出现网络公司式的萧条，但这不太可能成为导致美国或全球经济崩溃的系统性事件。【原文：The U.S. artificial intelligence investment boom may be followed by a dot-com-style bust, but it is less likely to be a systemic event that would crater the U.S. or global economy, the International Monetary Fund's chief economist, Pierre-Olivier Gourinchas, said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 通胀和债务压力削弱美联储宽松政策，长期国债收益率将继续走高
item.description: 路透社的一项民意调查显示，短期美国国债收益率将因对美联储降息的预期而走低，即使长期国债收益率也会因通胀胶着、赤字膨胀和对美联储独立性的担忧而受到抵制。【原文：Short-dated U.S. Treasury yields will edge lower on expectations of Federal Reserve rate cuts even as the long end resists the pull thanks to sticky inflation, swelling deficits and concerns about Fed independence, a Reuters poll showed.】

item.title: 摩根大通首席执行官称，对倒闭汽车经销商 Tricolor 的风险敞口 "不是我们最好的时刻"
item.description: 摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）在周二的电话会议上告诉记者，摩根大通对破产汽车经销商 Tricolor 的风险敞口 "并不是我们最辉煌的时刻"。【原文：JPMorgan Chase's exposure to bankrupt auto dealer Tricolor is "not our finest moment," the bank's CEO Jamie Dimon told reporters on a conference call on Tuesday.】

item.title: Verizon 为受停摆影响的政府工作人员提供救济
item.description: Verizon 通信公司周二表示，将为受政府停摆两周影响的政府工作人员提供延期付款选择。【原文：Verizon Communications said Tuesday that it will offer government workers impacted by a two-week-old government shutdown payment deferral options.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）称欧洲经济将保持增长，但财政成本将不断增加
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二在更新《世界经济展望》时表示，尽管受到美国关税的拖累，欧元区的经济增长仍将保持，但这将以政府支出增加和债务上升为代价。【原文：Euro zone economic growth will hold up despite a drag from U.S. tariffs but this will come at a cost of higher government spending and rising debt, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday in an update of its World Economic Outlook.】

item.title: 中美贸易战硝烟再起，IMF上调经济增长预期，关税更趋温和
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二上调了对2025年全球经济增长的预测，原因是关税冲击和金融状况比预期的要好，但该组织警告说，唐纳德-特朗普总统威胁重启的中美贸易战可能会大幅减缓产出。【原文：The International Monetary Fund edged up its 2025 global growth forecast on Tuesday as tariff shocks and financial conditions have proven more benign than expected, but warned that a renewed U.S.-China trade war threatened by President Donald Trump could slow output significantly.】

item.title: 随着利润攀升，美国银行业巨头预计交易热潮将持续下去
item.description: 华尔街高管预测，第三季度投资银行业务的暴利将持续到今年下半年，从而推动美国银行业巨头的利润增长。【原文：Wall Street executives predicted that windfall earnings from investment banking in the third quarter would continue for the rest of the year, buoying profits at U.S. banking giants.】

item.title: 波音公司获得价值 27 亿美元的 "爱国者 "导弹寻的器合同
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，该公司已获得约 27 亿美元的多年期合同组合，为 "爱国者 "拦截导弹提供一个关键制导组件。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it has secured about $2.7 billion in a combination of multi-year contracts to supply a key guidance component for the Patriot interceptor missiles.】

item.title: Salesforce 与 OpenAI、Anthropic 深化人工智能联系，为 Agentforce 平台提供动力
item.description: Salesforce 扩大了与 OpenAI 和 Anthropic 的合作关系，将它们的前沿人工智能模型集成到其 Agentforce 360 平台中，旨在为更广泛的企业和受监管行业提供企业级人工智能工具。【原文：Salesforce expanded partnerships with OpenAI and Anthropic to integrate their frontier AI models into its Agentforce 360 platform, aiming to deliver enterprise-grade AI tools to a wider range of businesses and regulated industries.】

item.title: 北极星因分拆印度摩托车部门和盈利预测而股价大涨
item.description: 北极星股价在周二的盘前交易中上涨超过 10%，此前这家动力运动车制造商表示将分拆旗下印第安摩托车部门，并预测第三季度将实现盈利，超出华尔街的亏损预期。【原文：Shares of Polaris rose more than 10% in premarket trading on Tuesday after the power-sports vehicle maker said it would spin off its Indian Motorcycle unit and forecast a third-quarter profit, beating Wall Street's loss expectations.】

item.title: 喜力称阿姆斯特丹总部重组将影响约 400 个工作岗位
item.description: 喜力周二在一份声明中表示，荷兰啤酒制造商喜力在阿姆斯特丹总部的重组将影响约 400 个工作岗位。【原文：Dutch brewer Heineken's Amsterdam headquarters reorganization will affect approximately 400 jobs, Heineken said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 市场担忧首相人选和中美紧张局势，日本股市跳水
item.description: 日本股市在长周末后于周二下挫，创下自 4 月份以来的最大单日跌幅，原因是投资者对围绕该国下任总理的不确定性以及持续的中美贸易紧张局势感到担忧。【原文：Japanese shares sank on Tuesday after a long weekend, clocking their sharpest one-day drop since April, as investors fretted over uncertainty surrounding the country's next premier and persistent U.S.-China trade tensions.】

item.title: 石油企业高管表示特朗普关税将增加成本
item.description: 两家石油公司的高管本周警告说，美国政府的贸易政策导致的关税正在推高整个能源生产链的成本，并影响投资决策。【原文：The executives of two oil companies warned this week that tariffs resulting from the U.S. administration's trade policies were driving up costs across the energy production chain and affecting investment decisions.】

item.title: 瑞士法院称，在瑞士信贷救援中注销 200 亿美元债券不合法
item.description: 瑞士一家法院周二表示，瑞士当局在 2023 年决定注销瑞士信贷 165 亿瑞士法郎（约合 205.3 亿美元）的债券是不合法的，这引发了人们对瑞士信贷的救援和随后被瑞银收购的处理方式的新质疑。【原文：Swiss authorities' 2023 decision to write off 16.5 billion Swiss francs ($20.53 billion) in Credit Suisse bonds was unlawful, a court said on Tuesday, raising fresh questions about how the bank's rescue and subsequent takeover by UBS was handled.】

item.title: Meta 的 Instagram 将为青少年账户添加 PG-13 电影风格的分级
item.description: Meta 周二表示，Instagram 上的青少年账户将默认以 PG-13 电影分级为指导，因为这家社交媒体公司在保护 18 岁以下用户方面做得不够，正面临着严格的审查。【原文：Meta said on Tuesday that teenager accounts on Instagram will be guided by PG-13 movie ratings by default, as the social media company faces intense scrutiny for not doing enough to protect users under 18.】

item.title: 甲骨文将使用 AMD 即将推出的人工智能芯片提供云服务
item.description: 甲骨文公司周二表示，将使用先进微设备公司（Advanced Micro Devices）即将推出的 MI450 人工智能芯片提供云服务。【原文：Oracle will offer cloud services using Advanced Micro Devices' upcoming MI450 artificial intelligence chips, the companies said on Tuesday, as they rush to tap the booming demand for infrastructure to support tools such as ChatGPT.】

item.title: 尽管中美关税升级，欧洲企业盈利前景依然光明
item.description: 根据 LSEG I/B/E/S 编制的最新估计，尽管中美贸易紧张局势最近有所加剧，但分析师对欧洲公司第三季度业绩的预期比一周前要乐观一些。【原文：Analysts are a little more upbeat about European companies' third-quarter results than a week ago, according to the latest estimates compiled by LSEG I/B/E/S, despite the latest flare-up in trade tensions between the U.S. and China.】

item.title: Albertsons 因杂货需求稳定而上调年度利润预期
item.description: Albertsons 周二上调了年度利润和销售预期，理由是尽管消费者预算紧张，但对基本杂货和药店产品的需求稳定。【原文：Albertsons raised its annual profit and sales forecast on Tuesday, citing steady demand for essential groceries and pharmacy products despite tight consumer budgets.】

item.title: 加拿大地平线飞机公司为其混合动力飞机选择普惠发动机
item.description: Horizon 飞机公司周二表示，已同意购买普惠加拿大公司的 PT6A 发动机，用于其混合动力垂直起飞飞机。【原文：Horizon Aircraft has agreed to buy Pratt & Whitney Canada's PT6A engine for its hybrid vertical takeoff aircraft, it said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 花旗集团利润攀升，收入创历史新高，但墨西哥出售交易拖累利润
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup）公布第三季度利润增长，所有部门的收入均创历史新高，这使得该银行股价在盘前交易中上涨了约 1%。【原文：Citigroup reported a rise in third-quarter profit, as all its divisions brought in record revenue, sending the bank's shares up about 1% in trading before the bell.】
